==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|しん|yomi=o}}
/disin/ > /zisin/. Literally "ground shake".

====Pronunciation====
* {{ja-pron|じしん|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}
* {{homophones|lang=ja|自信}} (confidence), [[自身]] (one's self), [[時針]] (hour-hand (of clock or watch)), [[磁針]] (compass), [[磁心]] (magnetic core)

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じしん|hhira=ぢしん}}

# shaking of the earth; an [[earthquake]]

=====Related terms=====
{{top2}}
* {{ja-r|震源地|しんげんち}}: epicenter
{{mid2}}
* {{ja-r|余震|よしん}}: aftershock
{{bottom}}

=====See also=====
{{top2}}

* {{ja-r|津波|つなみ}}: tsunami, tidal wave
{{mid2}}

{{bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
/nawi/ > /nai/. Japanese loses labialization before non-open vowels.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[nai]|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ない|hhira=なゐ}}

# {{label|ja|obsolete}} an [[earthquake]]
#* '''720''', [[w:Nihon Shoki|Nihon Shoki]] (year 415)
#*:: 五年秋七月丙子朔己丑、'''地震'''。先是、命葛城襲津彦之孫玉田宿禰、主瑞齒別天皇之殯。則當'''地震'''夕、遣尾張連吾襲、察殯宮之消息。時諸人悉聚無闕。
#* '''1212''', [[w:Hōjōki|Hōjōki]]
#*: また、同じころかとよ、おびたゝしく大'''地震'''ふること侍き。[...] 恐れのなかに恐るべかりけるは、只'''地震'''なりけりとこそ覺え侍しか。[...] よのつね、驚くほどの'''地震'''、二三十度ふらぬ日はなし。

===Etymology 3===
/nawi/ > /nai/ > /nae/. Middle Japanese /e/ was realized as [je], hence the below citation.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[nae]|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|なえ}}

# an [[earthquake]]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|455}}
#*: '''Naye'''. ナエ(地震) 地震. '''Naye'''ga yuru. (地震が揺る) 地震がする.
